title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Instructional Design for Addressing Heterogeneity in History Education: Differentiated Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Core theories of history education and experience in lesson design
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Using differentiated instructional strategies, learners can analyze cognitive, affective, and sociocultural heterogeneity in history classes and design response plans.
Applying collaborative learning and scaffolding techniques, develop PBL activity plans that reflect the needs of diverse learner levels.
Develop a systematic rubric to evaluate historical concept comprehension and inquiry skills through a hierarchical approach.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
